description:
Cozy  2 bedroom apartment in upper east side. 
Perfect for couples, families and solo travelers. 
The apartemt is located in one of the hottest places of NYC , close to subway station, Central Park, the Metropolitan museum and other museums. In the area you can find many stores, markets, cafes, local cozy restaurants and bars. 
Upper east side is a very safe, friendly and relaxed neighborhood.

Location
name: Beautiful two bedroom apartment in Upper East
